
\=head1 NAME

model_run

\=head1 DESCRIPTION



\=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - 
 doi (character varying) - 
 model_identifier (character varying) - 
 scenario_identifier (character varying) - 
 spatial_resolution (character varying) - 
 range_start (date) - 
 range_end (date) - 
 sequence (integer) - 
 sequence_description (character varying) - 
 activity_identifier (character varying) - 
 project_identifier (character varying) - 
 time_resolution (interval) - 


\=head1 SCHEMA

                             Table "gcis_metadata.model_run"
         Column        |       Type        |     Modifiers      | Storage  | Description 
 ----------------------+-------------------+--------------------+----------+-------------
  identifier           | character varying | not null           | extended | 
  doi                  | character varying |                    | extended | 
  model_identifier     | character varying | not null           | extended | 
  scenario_identifier  | character varying | not null           | extended | 
  spatial_resolution   | character varying | not null           | extended | 
  range_start          | date              | not null           | plain    | 
  range_end            | date              | not null           | plain    | 
  sequence             | integer           | not null default 1 | plain    | 
  sequence_description | character varying |                    | extended | 
  activity_identifier  | character varying |                    | extended | 
  project_identifier   | character varying |                    | extended | 
  time_resolution      | interval          |                    | plain    | 
 Indexes:
     "model_run_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
     "model_run_doi_key" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (doi)
     "model_run_model_identifier_scenario_identifier_spatial_reso_key" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (model_identifier, scenario_identifier, spatial_resolution, range_start, range_end, sequence)
 Check constraints:
     "model_run_identifier_check" CHECK (identifier::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text))
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "model_run_activity_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (activity_identifier) REFERENCES activity(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
     "model_run_model_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (model_identifier) REFERENCES model(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
     "model_run_project_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (project_identifier) REFERENCES project(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
     "model_run_scenario_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (scenario_identifier) REFERENCES scenario(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Has OIDs: no
 

\=cut
